title: SHS Graduate Shares Transformation From Schoolgirl To Glamourous Look After WASSCE - YEN.COM.GH
text: SHS Graduate Shares Transformation From Schoolgirl To Glamourous Look After WASSCE - A female SHS graduate shared a video documenting her transformation after finishing her final WASSCE paper - The video showed her leaving school for a salon where she permed and styled her hair, and also got her makeup done - Several social media users who commented on the post asked why the graduate was in a hurry to get her hair done A female SHS student shared a video showing a transformation journey from a short-haired student to a young lady with permed hair. The SHS graduate shared a video showing her packing her things and leaving school after her final West African Secondary School Certificate Examination (WASSCE) paper. [In a video](https://x.com/JasperZiggle/status/1836546783620563267) on X, the girl was wearing a blue skirt with a white top, just like the other students in the school. Someone helped her carry her jute bag. She later showed a video of her [in the salon](https://yen.com.gh/people/260376-lux-hair-salon-ghanaian-lady-mocked-by-salon-wokers-demands-apology/) after she arrived home. The young lady had her hair permed and fixed in a ponytail. The graduate also got her [makeup](https://yen.com.gh/tags/makeup/) done, and that changed her appearance the most. Netizens comment on SHS student's video Social media users thronged to the comment section to express their opinions on the transformation of the graduate in the video shared by [@JasperZiggle](https://x.com/JasperZiggle). YEN.com.gh has collated some of these comments. @i_mugeez said: "Results go come ah na F in chains but money dey house. Daddy or zaddy go pay" @1_neil_ken wrote: "Ahhhh girl weiiüòÇüòÇüòÇüòÇ I know am ma junior üòÇü§¶" @manLike_Cecil69 said: "Mama s3 s3n " @dnsavagge wrote: "Na me err üò≠" @nuumooshatta said: "Lol " @ZamaniZane83 wrote: "She dey wan grow so fast" @_Kwabena_Kodua said: "Thank you Idolo But Eiiii üòÇüòÇüòÇüòÇ" Mom visits daughter in school with champagne YEN.com.gh also reported that a Ghanaian mom went to her [daughter's school ](https://yen.com.gh/people/family-relationships/267135-mom-visits-visit-daughter-school-complete-shs-pops-champagne/)with items to celebrate her completing SHS. In a video shared on TikTok, the woman poured champagne on her daughter after she completed her last WASSCE paper. The girl's classmates were also captured dancing and celebrating happily after the end of their secondary school journey.
